snippet: India's Prime Minister says country must do more to ease malnutrition.
abstract: India's Prime Minister says country must do more to ease malnutrition.
lead_paragraph: A recently released report finds that more than two out of five Indian children under the age of 5 suffer from malnutrition, Jim Yardley writes, a fact that Prime Minister Manmohan Singh calls "a matter of national shame." The assessment from the Naandi Foundation, an independent charitable organization, came after the group conducted a survey of more than 73,000 households in nine states across the country.
